website_summaries.verdict: Secure ankle lockdown and breathability are just two features you can expect from the Adidas Combat Speed 5. Moving out of tricky spots is made easy by the suede elements partnered with the flexible split-sole on this model. To top it all off, this footgear is lightweight, which adds to its appeal.
pros: A vast majority of users have marveled at how comfortable the Adidas Combat Speed 5 is during matches
The durability of this pair of wrestling shoes has impressed a large number of owners who claimed that it lasted for years
According to numerous wrestlers, the outsole has the right balance of traction and slide on mats
Many users are pleased with the flexibility of the trainer
The breathable upper is appreciated by plenty of wearers because it kept their feet cool
A lot of athletes have praised the lightweight nature of the footwear because it made them more agile
The footgear is deemed versatile by multiple folks who used it for wrestling, boxing, and weight training
cons: Several people are dismayed with the ankle strap on the Adidas Combat Speed 5 because it is a bit short so it doesn’t fasten properly
A few individuals who use it for wrestling and boxing noted that this wrestling shoe did not provide traction on the canvas ring

customer_reviews.title: My favourite shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 9UK, not particulary wide or narrow feet and a 9 is perfect. Fit like a glove. I wear for boxing and other martial arts multiple times a week and have had these for over 2 years. I just replace like for like them whenever they wear out. You simply cannot beat basic addidas boxing/wrestling boots. If I could wear them to work I would (although, I would need trainers for travelling to-from as they will get immediately ruined if you wear them outdoors)
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Deadlifts
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a cheaper alternative to a branded shoe specifically for deadlifting RRP £100. They are perfect. They fit very snug width wise, and they are not bulky. Feet are firmly flat to the floor and grips well. I would 100% recommend these for deadlifts.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Dior

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for powerlifting
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for shoes for powerlifting. Especially deadlift requires flat sole, ultra lightweight shoes. This Adidas doing an absolutely perfect job. It holds my foot and even the ankle but in the meantime it's super light. It's a bit tight to put on, but once You wear it it's one of the most comfortable thing I've ever worn. Made of breathing material and the sole gives good grip as well. I use it over a year now multiple times a week, and still like brand new. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way too small. Not convinced they are genuine!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the wrestling boots after reading all the good reviews. I am a size 9 UK. These are way to small. Could not even get them on my feet! On closer inspection, the quality is not up to expectation. You can see where the glue has overlapped on to the fabric from the sole. I'm not convinced that these boots are genuine and to make it worse, I have to pay the postage to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are lovely but, ,,,
customer_reviews.text: I love them, I did however expect they'd be a little more padded especially on the sole. Still they are lovely training shoes. I bought a half size larger and they are perfect,especially for my training. People with broad feet mat need to consider looking for something that has a broader base. My impression is that these are for people with slim feet
customer_reviews.author: aYo Binitie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent low top boxing boot.
customer_reviews.text: Great low boot. Very light. Slim. Comfortable fit. Great Velcro band on elastic at top; keeps lace knot away. Superb boot for boxing training. Used on pad work/ shadow, ground work, skipping. Wish I had replaced my old ones sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Shoes arrived next day as expected. The fit of these shoes was just right for me. I was a bit worried they were going to be narrow as my feet are quite wide (EE). I am very happy with the quality, they are well made, light and perfect for Muay Thai. Some reviews recommended getting the next size up, but I am glad I didn't.
customer_reviews.author: C. Benson

customer_reviews.title: Annoyed
customer_reviews.text: Really annoyed. Bought this product in 3.5 uk and it arrived in a 6 uk. No way of contacting seller. Everytime i now click 3.5 and successfully add it to my basket, in the basket description it says uk 6. Some sort of default error but really want correct size!!! HELP
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very Very Narrow
customer_reviews.text: After reading other reviews, I ordered a size up from normal. However, it was a real struggle trying to get these boots on. I had to eventually completely remove the laces to force my feet in. Even then, my feet were visibly stretching the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Meldrew

customer_reviews.title: Great gym trainers
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a trainer to wear in the gym for deadlifting but I now wear them every day in the gym. They were difficult to get on the first few times wearing them but after having been worn in I wouldnt wear anything else. Ive had these for a few months now and I have nothing bad to say about these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: G. W. Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Buy a Size Bigger
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for Martial arts and I am finding them a good all round shoe. Good on the ground and toe to toe. The listed sizing is a problem. I ordered a 9 UK they sent me a 9 UK Label they where a full size too small. sent them back and ordered another pair Size 10 UK they fit fine. This is the only Pair of size 10 shoes I own or have ever owned as I am a size 9 ! So cost me the return postage but as I said good shoe but order a size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Jamtastic

customer_reviews.title: Size 8 fit perfectly. Excellent grip on mats
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 8 and it fit perfectly for me. Was a bit unsure with the size as others mentioned shoes were tight, but it was fine for me. Shipping was delayed but that's Amazon's fault for not being able to keep up with their promises of next day prime delivery...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: order size larger
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes but my son is always a size 8 but they were too small so reordered a 9 & he was happy & they looked good
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Sadly come up a little small
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Looks good, well made and perfect for fight sports. Sadly they come up quite small and I ended up with so black big toenails with blood blisters underneath them after 2 days of use. I wish I'd known I would've bought half a size bigger as otherwise a really great product.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: Overall good quality boot.
customer_reviews.text: Good boot and quality is excellent. Flexible where it need to be. Only minor complaint is that it is rather narrow at the toes where you could do with allowing them to splay out during movement. Other than that, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I used these in the gym for weightlifting. They are just perfect for deadlifting and squats, super comfy. I'm an 8 so order an 8, they are a very snug fit but comfy
customer_reviews.author: Alan Paterson

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I swap these from the Asics Aggressor. I bought half a size bigger 9.5UK, but I could have bought 10UK. Despite that the shoes are great and the grip on the floor is amazing. It help my footwork and speed.
customer_reviews.author: Przemo79

customer_reviews.title: Sole of shoe broke
customer_reviews.text: The fit was too small and because theyre my first time buying i thought id order a size up and they were still too tight even without socks ..and then after a few uncomfortable but barable wears the bottom of the shoe started to break and open up
customer_reviews.author: PowerbuildingBoxer

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, budget wrestling boots. Just order half a size bigger than your actual size as these are a tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: TRICKY

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this shoes for my gym workout for past few months. Its really really good as it gives a very stable support to push through the ground for all key compound lifts especially the deadlifts.. Highly recommended...
customer_reviews.author: Sandeep  Jan

customer_reviews.title: A good quality product
customer_reviews.text: A good pair of boots and perfect what I need them for. The fit is good and they are comfy to wear with a good grip. Delivery was quick and I would be happy to recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. J. Deacon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This shoes are awesome. Much better than Longsdale crap. I was worried about size, but found size chart elsewhere. Using now for 4 months and still they look like new.
customer_reviews.author: Arek F.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice boots nice quality and will be used for deadlifts as my wrestling days are over,lol and on a side note I'd recommend one size bigger than normal size as others have said
customer_reviews.author: james doherty

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good for deadlifting
customer_reviews.text: Brought these shoes to deadlift in at the gym. Comfortable and grip the floor well. I normally wear a 10 but brought a 11 due to adidas shoes tending to be a little tight. Snug but comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew B.

customer_reviews.title: These are an amazing quality product which I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are an amazing quality product which I highly recommend, the service of these sellers is also very good! I ordered a size 9 which was too small (in my error) so I called the number and emailed them(you get a small note with your order with their details) and they helped me to exchange for a larger size, 10/10 definitely recommend👌🏻
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Fit well. Tight fitting and light. I wear them in training all the time. No problems
customer_reviews.author: Sinead Price-Greene

customer_reviews.title: I understand why their a best seller
customer_reviews.text: What a comfy and supportive shoe/trainer, I love wearing them. I may even buy a second pair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product fitted the size,good materials
customer_reviews.text: I had one pair of the same shoes before,I am very happy about the service provided by the seller,fast delivery and good price.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Giacometti

customer_reviews.title: Good for the gym!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, strong and great for gym but I’d recommend getting half a size bigger
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoe. Really sexy gym shoe
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoe. Really sexy gym shoe, I noticed the sly admiring looks while wearing them with nice cropped combat gym joggers and a white vest. Really pleased with this purchased as it was time to retire my former gym footwear.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Azkar Shah

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers super fast postage!!
customer_reviews.text: Really comfy fit I'm normally a 9.5 is a perfect fit n ordered a 10 and fits perfect so would recommend half a size bigger then you normally are. Also this seller was really helpful when I asked a question. Also which is even better was I received my trainers the day after I ordered them. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: really good mat shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great for Mats, bought for Krav maga, fit well and do the job
customer_reviews.author: BARRY

customer_reviews.title: Tight Fit...
customer_reviews.text: The size recommended for me was 9.5 UK size. After reading reviews and previous issues i ordered a size 11 / 46. Turned out to be a perfect fit...
customer_reviews.author: mark smith

customer_reviews.title: sizing is completely wrong
customer_reviews.text: Ignore the advertised sizing, I'm a 9 UK, 9 in this boot would not fit at all, 9.5 doesnt fit, would need a 10 at least which will be too big in the heel and length Steer clear and buy a correctly sized boot where the toe is actually proportional to the shoe size
customer_reviews.author: Oisin O. Ceallaigh

customer_reviews.title: Great for deadlifts
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, when I opened the box I thought they would be way too small, but I was wrong. They fit great, and are extremely comfortable, they weigh virtually nothing. A bit tough on squats, might continue using my normal squat shoes there, but for everything else (deadlift, bench, overhead) they're great.
customer_reviews.author: Donsimoni Jean Roch

customer_reviews.title: Small fitting I recommend a size up from your normal size
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to deadlift in & they’re perfect & very reasonably priced
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Great for self defence training
customer_reviews.text: At first I was a bit apprehensive but when i got it and tried them during krav maga training... perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian S.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: They arrived 3 days earlyer to Ireland. They fit perfectly. Very comfortable. I use them for Krav Maga.
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Boxing
customer_reviews.text: Good boots don’t help my boxing but the sole look good when I get knocked on my arse
customer_reviews.author: Sweetnuts

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe but bad fitting
customer_reviews.text: The shoe itself is good and comfortable, but be careful of sizing - try ordering at least one size up from your normal shoe size. They're wrestling shoes, so should be a cozy fit, but first you have to manage to get the shoe on!
customer_reviews.author: Jemima Adam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service
customer_reviews.text: Initially, the size 11 boots i received were too small so I returnedthem and received a larger size
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Long

customer_reviews.title: but they are well made and cool on feet when used love
customer_reviews.text: had to order a half size up .but they are well made and cool on feet when used love em
customer_reviews.author: shawn parry

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: As a Powerlifter I needed some shoes with a flat sole but with some ankle support. These do the job perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Gurnaik Birring

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product. Used them a few times now and they are exactly what I expected. Good value for money as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerlifting
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for deadlifts as I recently switched to sumo stance and can say it has drastically improved my form and following my queues in the set up. Recommend for anyone struggling off the floor in the deadlift
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Really comfy training shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for krav maga, they fit really well. I bought a half size up and they are perfect, really comfy and have good grip on the Matt's.
customer_reviews.author: Kate cottam

customer_reviews.title: Quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Grandson picked them for wrestling training fitted well and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: Some seriously good shoes, where them for weight training and there flat enough to stabilise me. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Junior Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes and the sizing is perfect fit. Look forward to using them next week.
customer_reviews.author: Sibusiso

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Good price and I wear them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Pas 27

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought these boots for deadlifting and they’re perfect for it. Great fit
customer_reviews.author: colin brindle

customer_reviews.title: Pathetic
customer_reviews.text: After waiting for 2 weeks, guess what, nothing arrived. Great stuff, good job!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Vlaicu

customer_reviews.title: Get size up
customer_reviews.text: Definitely need to get a size up, 1st returned without quibble
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Spot on!!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy, great fit and grip, ideal for what I needed them for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Catch on ankles
customer_reviews.text: Boots are really clean with a really nice grip but catch on my ankles i can't wear them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TIGHT FIT, be wary if you have wider feet.
customer_reviews.text: Be wary if you have wide feet, chose size 9 and it was a very tight fit on the toes. Had to return them they was that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect except to small
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boot great quality just too tight width wise. Will go back to hogs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best get these half a size up as they run ...
customer_reviews.text: Best get these half a size up as they run quite narrow, but are still very comfortable and ideal for deadlifting/gym use.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jones

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair for my husband-a half size bigger to avoid any toe injuries. My husband loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Reshuni

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, great shoes these for training wrestling or boxing ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect , great shoes these for training wrestling or boxing or even lifting weights

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic training boots
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son for wrestling training. They fit lovely and he loves them xxx

customer_reviews.title: they look fine but will know how good they are once my ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as advised. Bought for my son for Xmas, they look fine but will know how good they are once my son opens on Xmas day

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow fitting for an 6.
customer_reviews.text: Too narrow fitting for an 6.3 man size 11 shoe was thin and would not even wrap around his ankle
customer_reviews.author: linda obrien

customer_reviews.title: Very strong material. So will last u a few years
customer_reviews.text: Amazing fit and comfy and keeps the cold out while I’m on my bike to the gym

customer_reviews.title: Very light and have great
customer_reviews.text: Quite tight, but they are supposed to be. Very light and have great grip
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: These trainers look great just a shame they are to small
customer_reviews.text: These trainers look great just a shame they are to small. I would definitely recommend going a size bigger if you want these
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: best to buy a full size up from what you ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality, although clearly lightweight as aimed at sports users, but robust enough to wear out in dry weather. As everyone else reports, best to buy a full size up from what you normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: just finish a session with them it doesn't feel like you wearing shoes! fit perfectly great buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Adidas Unisex Adults' AQ3325 Wrestling Shoes, Black (Black), 5 UK 38 EU
feature_bullets: Perfect boots for speed and stability in the ring
Gum rubber outsole with three pivot points to deliver consistent grip
Sturdy single layer open mesh upper construction for superior climate control
Synthetic suede overlays for lightweight durability and comfort
Lace up and elasticated closure for ideal support
